sentences.en: CNN host Kafudi vicious attacks on abusive defame China to insult the Chinese people's remarks.
sentences.cn: CNN主持人卡弗蒂发表辱骂中国恶毒攻击诋毁侮辱中国人民的言论.

sentences.en: Sgt. Norwood complained that the article defamed him.
sentences.cn: 诺维德中士抱怨这篇文章诽谤他。

sentences.en: Their attempt to defame China will get nowhere.
sentences.cn: 这些人利用谣言抹黑中国的企图决不会得逞.

sentences.en: To attack the character or reputation of; speak ill of; defame.
sentences.cn: 攻击人格或名誉; 说坏话; 诽谤.

sentences.en: We expect politicians to defame each other in an election year.
sentences.cn: 我们预料政客们在选举年会互相诽谤.

sentences.en: When you meet somebody who you do not like, do not defame him, it is silence.
sentences.cn: 当别人谈论莫名其妙的八卦的时候, 不添油加醋, 这便是沉默.

words.tran_cn: 诽谤的；中伤的；破坏名誉的

trans.tran_en: to write or say bad or untrue things about someone or something, so that people will have a bad opinion of them
